name: Franziskus Kiefer
body:
Hi!

My name is Franziskus Kiefer. I'm PhD student at Univeristy of Surrey supervised by [Mark Manulis](http://www.manulis.eu) and [Shujun Li](http://www.surrey.ac.uk/computing/people/shujun_li) on the topic of password based authentication. Before, I finished my MSc studies in Computer Science and IT-Security at the [Technische Universität Darmstadt](http://www.tu-darmstadt.de) in October 2012. Besides my studies I worked for [FlexSecure GmbH](http://www.flexsecure.de) as software developer.

***

### Short CV
<dl>
  <dt> 2013- </dt>
  <dd> PhD Student at the Department of Computing at University of Surrey </dd>

  <dt>2010-2012 </dt>
  <dd> Master of Science (MSc) degree in Computer Science from Technische Universität Darmstadt </dd>

  <dt>2010-2012</dt>
  <dd> Master of Science (MSc) degree in IT-Security from Technische Universität Darmstadt </dd>

  <dt>2009-2012</dt>
  <dd> Software developer for  FlexSecure GmbH </dd>

  <dt> 2007-2010</dt>
  <dd> Bachelor of Science (BSc) degree in Computer Science from Technische Universität Darmstadt </dd>

  <dt> 2006-2007</dt>
  <dd> Community Service at University Hospital Rechts der Isar of the Technischen Universität München </dd>

  <dt>2006</dt>
  <dd> Abitur (A-Level) at Gymnasium Marianum Warbug Westf.</dd>
</dl>

#### Attended Conferences & Schools

* CANS 2012
* SAM 2012
* Public Key Cryptography Workshop (PKC) 2012
* Is Cryptographic Theory Practically Relevant? @ Isaac Newton Institute for Mathematical Sciences Cambridge 2012
* Summer school on Elliptic Curve Cryptography (ECC) 2011

#### Open Source
* Contribution to FlexiProvider and BouncyCastle
